WorkshopItemInfo.Name: de_airstrip (1.6)
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
The 1.6 version of de_airstrip, ported to [i]Holdfast: Nations at War[/i]!
de_airstrip was a defuse map, first appearing in [i]1.6[/i] and subsequently re-appearing in [i]Condition Zero[/i]. Although unofficial ports exist for later games, it have never received any official support.
Supports Army Battlefield and Melee Arena. This map is best suited to smaller populations, the recommended configs available in this repository: https://github.com/AgentNo/holdfast-server-configs . Sappers will be unable to build on this map due to the lack of terrain.
This map also features working bombsite objectives. To plant a bomb, play as T and hold 'E' on either objective.
[url=https://www.models-resource.com/pc_computer/counterstrike16/model/28157/]de_airstrip model courtesy of ViGamezBoy.[/url]
Part of the 87th's Counter-Strike: Holdfast Offensive collection. Join us today - https://discord.gg/dakvCACDSF
[h3]Latest Update - v. 1.0.7[/h3] - Removed some lights in the A hangars - Added some more visibility blockers through walls around Caves and A site - Reduced the default amount of carpenters on Melee Arena from 6 to 3 per side
